greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 4 of inverse partition triangle A038498.
link: David A. Corneth, Table of n, a(n) for n = 4..2003
program: (PARI) first(n) = { my(m = matrix(n + 4, n + 4)); for(i = 2, n + 4, m[i, i] = 1; ); for(k = 2, n + 4, for(i = k + 1, n + 4, m[i, k] = m[i - (k-1), k] + m[i-1,k-1] ) ); m = matrix(n + 3, n + 3, i, j, m[i + 1, j + 1])^-1; vector(n, i, m[i + 3, 4]) } \\ _David A. Corneth_, Feb 27 2021
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 15 1999
ext: a(63) onward corrected by _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 27 2021
